original: EKLUND, Johannes L:son (Johan Jonas), Direktör, Stockholm, f Eslöv 2/12 78 av rust-håll L Andersson o h h, gm Sigrid Hammarstrand. Hdls- o språkstud Engl, Frankr o Tyskl, Gbgs hdlsinst :s forts.kurs. Vkst dir AB Silvanders sed. 12. Ordf Drottninggatans Frn sed. 29, Sthlms Herrekip.frb 32—37, Sthlms Detaljistfrb sed. 36, flm Sthlms Hdlskamm sed. 36, dess repr i Inst f bekämp av mutor p bestickn sed. 38, led Hdlns arb.giv.org :s öv.styr sed. 36, av Centr krigskonj.skattenmcln sed. 40, av hdlsdeleg t Engl 39, styr.led Brand-försäkr.AB Tor o Frn Sthlms Landstorms-kamr. RNO, RVO, OffFrd’A.
translated: EKLUND, Johannes L:son (Johan Jonas), Director, Stockholm, b. Eslöv on December 2, 1878, son of farmer L Andersson and his wife. Married to Sigrid Hammarstrand. Studied commerce and languages in England, France, and Germany, followed by a further course at Gothenburg Commercial Institute. Deputy director of AB Silvanders since 1912. Chairman of Drottninggatan's Association since 1929, Stockholm's Gentlemen's Tailoring Association from 1932 to 1937, Stockholm's Retailers Association since 1936, and Stockholm's Chamber of Commerce from 1936. Representative of the Institute for Combating Bribery and Corruption since 1938. Member of the Employers' Organization's executive board since 1936, the Central War Economic Tax Council since 1940, and the trade delegation to England in 1939. Board member of the Fire Insurance Company AB Tor and the Stockholm Landstorm Association. Awarded Royal Order of the North Star, Royal Order of Vasa, and Officer of the French Order of Agricultural Merit.
